A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson the director is a genius\, and improves on the already-superlative standard of Star Wars visuals with a flair unparalleled in modern blockbuster film-making.\nUnfortunately Rian Johnson the writer/screenwriter is a no-talent hack\, an idiot and a pseudo-intellectual buffoon.\nThe result is a smug\, joyless mess of a movie that's occasionally interesting to look at but terrible in all other regards.
